Title: Healing Helper
Description:
Gracus sent word for Ysera to come and see him. We arrived and found him in a dire condition. 

Our efforts to heal him so far have proved fruitless. But now that you are here, you can assist.

Gracus is of the Dream. Perhaps infusing his roots with something grown here will be the final thing we need to restore him.
ObjectivesText: Use the Root Restoration Fruit to help heal Gracus.
